contents:
Your description malfunctioned my brain.
What the heck did you even mean by "本人香港長大" slash "去過中國幾個城市" slash "我的認知上就只是崔健汪峰等", that's enough of an answer, lad, you found the shit out of it already. 崔健 is my nigger, the biggest in the history of Chinese bands.

To be serious, you don't need to know too much of it since you can't even use Google properly and don't seem to care about it at all.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chinese_rock
www.yaogun.com
